variable.name: START_AGE
variable.description: Age they initiated the drug, hydroxyurea, in years

variable.name: HU mg/kg
variable.description: Maximum tolerated daily dose of hydroxyurea in milligrams per kilogram

variable.name: BL F/F+S
variable.description: Baseline fetal hemoglobin (HbF) before starting hydroxyurea (%HbF/%HbF+ %HbS)*100

variable.name: MTD F/F+S
variable.description: Fetal hemoglobin (HbF) at the maximum hydroxyurea dose

variable.name: DELTA HbF
variable.description: (MTD F/F+S)-(BL F/F+S), where MTD F/F+S = Fetal hemoglobin (HbF) at the maximum hydroxyurea dose and BL F/F+S = Baseline fetal hemoglobin (HbF) before starting hydroxyurea (%HbF/%HbF+ %HbS)*100.
